segue_the_chain: An airbag is a protective device that cushions impact. Polystyrene does a similar job in protective packaging, so to Poly Styrene of X-Ray Spex…

segue_dave.line: Radiohead had a recording contract with Capitol Records and Billy Idol's "Eyes Without A Face" was released by the same record label...
segue_dave.explanation: Radiohead had a recording contract with the record label Capitol Records, and Radiohead had a recording contract with the record label Capitol Records.
